page.title: 20People involved in survey
page.content:
Area 0428 0357 surveyed and recorded by the children and staff of Holy Trinty School, Clifton Road, Matlock Bath, Derbyshire, helped by numerous parents. Work carried out in June and July 1985. The work involved walking to each part of the area in very hot weather and each journey involved steep uphill climbs. The children benefitted most, I feel, from the various interviews they carried out.
H.Q. Tarmac. Main offices of this multi-national company: Hadfield House Dale Road Matlock
Roadstone and Quarry Sections
